values.comments:
This course is a continuation of MATH502 and thus continues to cover groups, rings, fields, and other abstract algebraic systems, elementary Galois Theory, and linear algebra.

Students generally felt that this was “a good class that covered a lot of material.”

The majority of students found Professor Zywina to be a “fantastic instructor” with a “good ability to relay the difficult material in an easy to understand way.”

Most students felt that exams were “fair” and straightforward” and that homework was “manageable,” though a couple of students thought that the exams were “quite difficult.”

*6 respondents.
